items.summary:
In `frontend/src/components/players/ApaAggregateCharts.tsx`, update the Recharts `<Line />` stroke colors (visual-only) exactly as follows, without changing any chart data generation, keys, labels, or computations:
- PPI & aPPI Trend chart:
  - PPI line: `stroke="#000"`, `strokeWidth={2}`
  - aPPI line: `stroke="#2563eb"`, `strokeWidth={2}`
- Match Results chart:
  - Your Points line: `stroke="#000"`, `strokeWidth={2}`
  - Opponent Points line: `stroke="#2563eb"`, `strokeWidth={2}`
  - Defensive Shots line: `stroke="#7c3aed"`, `strokeWidth={2}`
In `frontend/src/components/players/ApaAggregateCharts.tsx`, set `connectNulls={true}` on every Recharts `<Line />` used in both the PPI & aPPI Trend chart and the Match Results chart.
